name: Pixel FreeKick - Soccer Tiny Cup
description:
You find yourself in a pixel atmosphere of the football World Cup, you are to choose a team and participate in the World Cup.

Simple operation with one touch, quick matches and fascinating mechanics.

You are to go through all the stages of playoff tournament, each stage you have to score more goals than miss. The closer to the finale, the more rivals!

Simple, funny, addictive and just amazing pixel football game.

***Features***
- Manage in one-touch
- Ability to play as a forward and goalkeeper
- Online national ranking
- Minimum commercials
- Endless football game
- Super high quality pixel graphics
- Awesome music and sound effects
- Spectacular storm of the gates

The Best football FREEKICKER!

Take your best FreeKick in amazing and awesome Pixel FreeKick Soccer Tiny Cup!
